page.title: 12LANGUAGE
page.content: In the village there has been a large development of houses and people have came into the village from many parts of the country.There are now,because of this,many {dialects} ranging from the original {Devon} used by the older local people,to Scottish spoke by some people.There are still some people who speak real {Devon.}The words are changing.People use the old dialects less now because they all listen to radio or television and use those forms of speech.Here are some {local {words}and their meaning Rimming-Chilly Thicky-That one Dimity-Getting dark Drissle-Thrush Towser-Apron Cutty-Wren Teddies-Potatoes Ade-Head Gurt-Great Dree-Three Drote-Throat Gwain-Going
